items.sentence: I thought Tom would take a walk before dinner.
Tom certainly didn\'t seem to be expecting us.
Make sure you don\'t do anything to upset Tom.
Mary and I\'ve been going out for three years.
Few people live to more than ninety years old.
Have you been listening to what Tom is saying?
Tom told me that he\'s never coming back here.
Tom seems a lot happier since he got divorced.
Tom should be able to do that if you help him.
Tom should never have been allowed to do that.
